meanings.definition: The state or quality of being tightly packed together in rows or ranks.
meanings.sent1: The serriednesses of the books on the shelf made it hard to find the one I needed.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers stood in serriednesses, ready for inspection.
meanings.sent3: The serriednesses of the cookies on the plate tempted me to grab more than one.
meanings.sent4: The serriednesses of the trees in the forest created a mesmerizing pattern.
meanings.sent5: The serriednesses of the stars in the night sky took my breath away.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging closely together in a compact formation.
meanings.sent1: The serriednesses of the flowers in the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved with serriednesses, creating a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent3: The serriednesses of the toys on the shelf made it look like a colorful display.
meanings.sent4: The serriednesses of the clouds in the sky resembled a fluffy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The serriednesses of the buildings in the cityscape gave it a unique charm.
